## Field-book

```{r}
gs <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1sAUp_SbgAoxoHblMl2ZjrQtswcBvPJXLRsf_sFdx3PI/edit?gid=1259559857#gid=1259559857" %>% 
  as_sheets_id()

fb <- gs %>% 
  range_read(ss = .,sheet = "fb")

#> Google fonts: https://fonts.google.com/

font <- c("Merriweather Sans", "Permanent Marker", "Tillana", "Roboto")
huito_fonts(font)
```

## Labels 

```{r}
label <- fb %>%
  label_layout(size = c(5.2, 10)
               , border_color = "forestgreen"
               , border_width = 1.5
               ) %>%
  include_image(
    value = "https://doctoradofisica.uni.edu.pe/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/d123d3.webp"
    , size = c(3, 3)
    , position = c(1.6, 9.5)
    ) %>% 
  include_image(
    value = "https://huito.inkaverse.com/img/scale.pdf"
    , size = c(5, 1)
    , position = c(2.6, 8.5)
    ) %>% 
  include_barcode(
    value = "qrcode"
    , size = c(5, 5)
    , position = c(2.6, 5.5)
    ) %>% 
  include_text(value = "plots"
               , position = c(4.4, 9.5)
               , size = 16
               , color = "black"
               , font = font[3]
               ) %>% 
  include_text(value = "salinidad"
               , position = c(2.6, 2.6)
               , size = 13
               , color = "blue"
               , font = font[2]
               , prefix = "Salinidad (ds/m): "
               ) %>% 
  include_text(value = "frijol"
               , position = c(2.6, 1.8)
               , size = 13
               , color = "red"
               , font = font[4]
               , prefix = "Var. frijoles: "
               ) %>% 
  include_image(
    value = "https://huito.inkaverse.com/img/scale.pdf"
    , size = c(5, 1)
    , position = c(2.6, 0.9)
    # , opts = 'image_convert(type = "Grayscale")'
    ) 

label %>% label_print()
```

```{r}
#| eval: false

label %>% 
  label_print(mode = "complete"
              , filename = "labels"
              , paper = c(21, 29.7)
              , units = "cm"
              )
```
